prune.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to cut off some of the branches of a tree or bush to make it grow better
prune.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make something smaller by removing parts that you do not need or want
prune.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The company is pruning staff in order to reduce costs.
The original version of the text has been pruned quite a bit.
prune.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a dried plum, often cooked before it is eaten
